I am **Lorenzo Posti**, research scientist with a Ph.D. in Astrophysics and >10 years
experience in data science, creative modelling, software development, and communication.
I am always curious about the latest algorithms out on the [arXiv](https://arxiv.org/).

In my career I [published papers](lop.qmd), I [shared code online](https://github.com/lposti/),
I [talked at international conferences](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Osj8_Dcx-tc&list=PL13iVyDVPizh0S7laBz3GGre3NJTuq7Rd&index=28&ab_channel=galaxies2016),
I [organised meetings](https://eas.unige.ch/EAS2020/session.jsp?id=SS19),
I managed small teams, I mentored students.

Find my full CV [here](resume23.pdf).

You can reach out to me at [lorenzo.posti@gmail.com](mailto:lorenzo.posti@gmail.com).
